text: Ray Charles Leonard (born May 17, 1956), better known as Sugar Ray Leonard, is a former American boxer. He was born in Wilmington, North Carolina. Leonard is believed by many to be one of the best boxers of all times. He was named the "Boxer of the Decade" for the 1980s. Leonard retired with a record of 36 wins (25 by knockout) 3 losses and 1 draw. He also won the gold medal in the 1976 Olympics. His mother named him after singer Ray Charles. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:African-American boxers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina Category:People from Wilmington, North Carolina
title: Sugar Ray Leonard
